thread.title: Adorable Pic: MS Dhoni's daughter Ziva enjoys first Durga Puja
thread.title_full: Adorable Pic: MS Dhoni's daughter Ziva enjoys first Durga Puja

title: Adorable Pic: MS Dhoni's daughter Ziva enjoys first Durga Puja
text:
Updated: Thursday, October 22, 2015, 11:59 [IST] Facebook Twitter Google+ Comments Mail 
Kolkata, Oct 22: Sakshi Dhoni once again posted an adorable picture of baby Ziva on micro-blogging site Twitter . Though daddy was missing in the picture, Ziva was looking adorable in her little white dress. 
This was Ziva's first Durga puja and mummy Sakshi did not miss the opportunity to take Ziva to puja pandals to take blessing from the goddess Durga. 
[ MS Dhoni speaks about daughter Ziva and how she has changed his life ] The Dhonis with baby Ziva 
While Captain Cool of Team India, MS Dhoni was busy preparing for the last ODI against Saouth Africa in Chennai on Oct 25, his wife Sakshi took Ziva to Durga puja pandals. Ziva s first Durga Pooja ...her first Pandal visit to Mecon col...Goddess Durga give her strength !!! pic.twitter.com/wEmmH1HN6Z â€” Sakshi Singh Dhoni (@SaakshiSRawat) October 19, 2015 
Sakshi, who is very active on social networking sites, always shares adorable pictures and videos of Ziva on Twitter.
